page.title: 04SHOPPING
page.content: We interviewed a{shopper}who shopped mostly at Safeway and Marks and Spencers,and sometimes at the market. Her{favourite}shop is Sainsburys in Coventry.She does not like restaurants and shoe shops in Stratford,but likes the freezer centre.She says that she will shop in the new Tesco hyper market which is going to be built on the Birmingham Road.She spends Â£35.00 a week on shopping and Â£3.00 at the market.The three most popular shops for vegetables}were Safeway,Tesco and Gateway.The three for{furniture}were Debenhams,Roberts and Rackhams.For {fruit}they were Safeway,Marks and Spencers and Tesco.Marks and Spencer,Debenhams and,Rackhams were the most popular for{clothes.}Safeway, Tesco and Gateway for{groceries}and {meat.}
